table.name: [dbo].[PhotoObj]
table.summary: The main PhotoObj table for the NVSS catalog
table.remarks: The main PhotoObj table for the NVSS catalog

column.name: [objID]
column.summary: unique object identifier

column.name: [ra]
column.summary: J2000 right ascension

column.name: [dec]
column.summary: J2000 declination

column.name: [cx]
column.summary: cartesian x coordinate

column.name: [cy]
column.summary: cartesian y coordinate

column.name: [cz]
column.summary: cartesian z coordinate

column.name: [htmid]
column.summary: htmid for spatial searches

column.name: [zoneid]
column.summary: Zone ID

column.name: [raErr]
column.summary: Estimate of J2000 right ascension standard deviation

column.name: [decErr]
column.summary: Estimate of J2000 declination standard deviation

column.name: [flux]
column.summary: Strength of the source

column.name: [fluxErr]
column.summary: Standard deviation estimate of the flux

column.name: [major]
column.summary: Major axis size of the source

column.name: [majorErr]
column.summary: Estimated standard deviation of the major axis size (nulls allowed)

column.name: [minor]
column.summary: Minor axis size of the source

column.name: [minorErr]
column.summary: Estimated standard deviation of the minor axis size (nulls allowed)

column.name: [pa]
column.summary: Orientation of the major axis on the sky (from N through E) (nulls allowed)

column.name: [paErr]
column.summary: Standard deviation estimate of Pa

column.name: [res]
column.summary: Code indicating structure more complex than can be fitted by the Gaussian model(P=peak, R=RMS, S=integrated) (nulls allowed)

column.name: [resOff]
column.summary: offending value (nulls allowed)

column.name: [p_flux]
column.summary: Integrated linearly polarized flux density (nulls allowed)

column.name: [p_fluxErr]
column.summary: Standard deviation estimate of the integrated linearly polarized flux density (nulls allowed)

column.name: [p_ang]
column.summary: Position angle of the "E" vectors on the sky if the source was detected in linear polarization (nulls allowed)

column.name: [p_angErr]
column.summary: Standard deviation estimate of p_ang (nulls allowed)

column.name: [field]
column.summary: Name of the original survey image field

column.name: [x_pix]
column.summary: X(Ra) pixel numbers of the center of the component

column.name: [y_pix]
column.summary: Y(Dec) pixel numbers of the center of the component
